You can personalize your sensitivity level. If know you are sensitive to bad air quality levels, the advice will adjust according your preference.
This is based on the COMEAP air pollution banding. Levels go from low pollution, to very high pollution. The air quality advice depends on this level.
Pollutants are updated approximately every hour, this depends on the local authorities sensors spread over the city.
Select single pollutants to visualize how good or bad are the readings from the background color.
